meanings.definition: Moving or situated along or near a coast.
meanings.sent1: The coastwise town had beautiful views of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The coastwise houses were painted in shades of blue and white.
meanings.sent3: The coastwise seagulls enjoyed the salty breeze.
meanings.sent4: The coastwise cliffs stood tall against the crashing waves.
meanings.sent5: The coastwise path hugged the shoreline closely.

meanings.definition: Traveling or shipping along a coast.
meanings.sent1: The coastwise ships carried goods to nearby ports.
meanings.sent2: The coastwise journey offered stunning views of the sea.
meanings.sent3: The coastwise sailors sang sea shanties as they sailed.
meanings.sent4: The coastwise trade route was bustling with activity.
meanings.sent5: The coastwise voyage was smooth and peaceful.

meanings.definition: In the direction of the coast.
meanings.sent1: The boat sailed coastwise towards the setting sun.
meanings.sent2: She walked coastwise along the sandy beach.
meanings.sent3: The seagull flew coastwise, following the shoreline.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed coastwise, eventually meeting the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The wind blew coastwise, carrying the scent of saltwater.
